description: Michishio Nagasumi's life couldn't be any more normal. In an odd twist of events, during his summer vacation he ends up almost drowning in the sea. Luckily, the cute mermaid Seto San appears to save him. However, San is from a yakuza mermaid family and according to their law, if a human is to catch sight of a mermaid, either he or the mermaid must die. The only other way is for Nagasumi to be taken in as a family member, marrying San. In attempts to save both of their lives, Nagasumi asks for San's hand in marriage. Nagasumi's summer vacation reaped more then what he would expect, as he must now protect San from others finding her secret out.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Mermaid
tags.description: A mythological creature with the body of a human and the tail of a fish.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Yakuza
tags.description: Centered around Japanese organised crime syndicates.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Chibi
tags.description: Features "super deformed" character designs with smaller, rounder proportions and a cute look.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

title.native: 否苦炒亜怒羅魔 極道の妻 KEJIME

node.description:
__Height:__ 153cm
__Weight:__ 54kg 
__Hobbies:__  Aroma therapy, Game, Nail art, Strolling

[Profile (Office Anemone)](http://office-anemone.com/mt-search.cgi?IncludeBlogs=4,5&tag=%e9%87%8e%e5%b7%9d%e3%81%95%e3%81%8f%e3%82%89) | [Official Website](http://www.nogawa-sakura.com/) | [Blog](http://blog.excite.co.jp/sakura0301) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/sakura_nogawa) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/sakura_nogawa/) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sakura_Nogawa) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E9%87%8E%E5%B7%9D%E3%81%95%E3%81%8F%E3%82%89)

Game Roles:~!
• "Misha" in Ar Tonelico
• "Nenesha" in Ar Tonelico 2
• "Lisette" in Atelier Lise
• "Nemu" in Da Capo
• "Fighter" in Granado Espada
• "Nana" in Kimi Kiss
• "Philo" in Mana Khemia
• "Hina" in Memories Off #5
• "Hina-ichigo" in Rozen Maiden
• "White Elis" in Rune Factory Frontier
• "Milreaf" in Summon Night 4 !~

The founder and former representative director of [Funimation](https://anilist.co/studio/102/).

**Non-anime roles:**
- Policeman in "Chuck E. Cheese in the Galaxy 5000"

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/995498317)

Interested in films and comics from his early childhood on. After graduating high school he went to Yoyogi Animation Gakuin and afterwards started working as animator for [Ajia-do](https://anilist.co/studio/30/). After becoming a freelancer for a short time, he joined Logistics where he worked in the software development section and was responsible for animation work and later developing tools for animation work in games. In 2002 he founded [Team Till Dawn](https://anilist.co/studio/6412/), which was also the beginning of his career as anime director.

His hobbies outside of work include bodybuilding, in which he has gone as far as to take part in competitions

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/93473950)

Worked as an assistant to [Shirou Oono](https://anilist.co/staff/132305/) in the late '90s.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/93473950)

Worked as an assistant to [Shirou Oono](https://anilist.co/staff/132305/) in the late '90s.
Scott Sager is mostly known as the ADR Engineer/Director at Funimation, but had a minor role in Voice Acting for Blue Gender, Strike Witches, and Hetalia Axis Powers.
_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/254528/)._
Started off as a composite artist.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/49378668) | [Fanbox (NSFW)](https://fujiishingo.fanbox.cc/posts/3033014)

Originating from [AIC](https://anilist.co/studio/48/), where his peers included [Yoshimichi Kameda](https://anilist.co/staff/105635/) and [Shinichi Kurita](https://anilist.co/staff/137119/). He drew analogically for the first two years of his career and then switched to digital. [Yasushi Muraki](https://anilist.co/staff/105090/) calls him a follower of [Souichirou Matsuda](https://anilist.co/staff/141244/), whom Fujii is influenced by.
